## PlainText.edit() method

Don't use edit directly. Be sure to use it through a proxy. The reason for setting the PlainText type as the return value is to provide the PlainText interface to the user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
edit(fromIdx: number, toIdx: number, content: string): PlainText;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fromIdx | number |  |
|  toIdx | number |  |
|  content | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[PlainText](./yorkie-js-sdk.plaintext.md)
